title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository: self-hosting engine that bundles Llama 2, Code Llama and other LLMs into a single CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate embeddings, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno & browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders in any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark/light themes).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Local GitHub-Copilot-style VS-Code extension powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example showing how to scale Ollama models across a Ray cluster.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama as a generator or embedder in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and fluent API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull models from Ruby.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama with async I/O.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; thin wrapper over REST API.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-models
summary: Registry of Modelfiles for Llama 2, Mistral, CodeLlama, Zephyr and more.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama completions and slash commands to workspaces.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for announcements, troubleshooting and showcasing Ollama projects.
